comments:
Steps to reproduce:
1.New a sample data source and a data set from table "CUSTOEMRS"
2.Drag the data set to the layout
3.Select the data set, switch to Script View, add "row.getColumnValue(1)" in "onFetch" method
4.Preview

Actual result:
The following items have errors: 


Table (id = 405): 
- There are errors evaluating script "row.getColumnValue(1)". 
Error.ScriptEvaluationError ( 122 time(s) )

*** Bug 167837 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***
Moving to 2.3 release since this does not fit 2.2.1 release criteria.
